Malik Hebbat

Hospitalstraße 5 · Offenbach am Main, 63065 · (+49) 01525 40 13 042 · name@email.com

I'm a full-time Research Assistant @ Deutsche Bundesbank in Frankfurt and a part-time student in Applied Data Science and Measurement @ Mannheim Business School (MBS). Right now I am researching Methods of combining data science with survey science, survey methodology and poverty in the society, and working on the Panel on Household Finances (PHF) @ Research Centre of Deutsche Bundesbank. In my leisure time, I like to explore cities with my wife –local and afar, play violin, read and collect books and art, and play Madden NFL.

Interests

Apart from being a research assistant, I enjoy most of my time being with my wife and exploring the world.

When forced indoors, I like playing violin, reading and collecting books and getting inspired by films and documentations. A hidden passion is to play Madden NFL.
